item.title: One 97 Communications Ltd Sees Significant Open Interest Surge Amid Price Weakness
item.description: One 97 Communications Ltd, the parent company of Paytm, has witnessed a notable surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite recent price declines, the spike in open interest and volume suggests increased speculative interest and potential directional bets in the near term. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Shekhawati Industries Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Robust Buying Pressure
item.description: Shekhawati Industries Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Garments & Apparels sector, witnessed a remarkable surge on 30 Jan 2026, hitting its upper circuit price limit with a strong 9.42% gain. This sharp rally was driven by intense buying interest, resulting in the stock touching an intraday high of ₹15.93, marking a near 20% jump from its previous close. Despite the surge, the stock experienced significant volatility and a regulatory freeze was imposed due to the upper circuit hit, leaving a substantial portion of demand unfilled. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bullish Momentum
item.description: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Ltd (MAZDOCK) has witnessed a significant surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. The stock has outperformed its sector peers and demonstrated robust volume and price action, prompting a closer examination of the underlying market dynamics and potential directional bets. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Dalmia Bharat Ltd Sees Significant Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Market Signals
item.description: Dalmia Bharat Ltd has witnessed a notable 10.6% increase in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite a marginal price gain of 0.12% on 30 Jan 2026, the stock remains under pressure from technical indicators and a recent downgrade by MarketsMOJO to a Sell rating, reflecting a complex interplay of bullish and bearish forces. Time: 10 minutes ago
